name: Weasel
description: A small, slender mammal known for its agility and speed, the Weasel has sharp teeth and excels at sneaking and hunting small prey.
memorable: Despite its size, it is a fierce hunter capable of stealing items from larger prey.
goals: To hunt small prey and find food in its natural environment.
relations: Weasels may be familiars to spellcasters and could be found in the same habitats as rodents and birds.
environment: Forests, grasslands, and other natural environments.
strengths: Exceptional agility and stealth allow it to avoid detection and capture small prey.
weaknesses: Extremely low hit points and weak strength limit its combat effectiveness.
attacks: It can make a Bite attack that deals minor piercing damage but has the unique ability to steal small items.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Hearing and Smell provides advantage on Perception checks based on those senses.
senses: Heightened Hearing and Smell allowing a perception score of 18 when relying on these senses.
skills: Has good stealth and perception skills, making it effective at sneaking and detecting hidden threats.
additional_information: Can steal items weighing 5 pounds or less from targets instead of dealing damage.
Makes an effective scout due to its agility and keen senses.
test_queries: small stealthy predator in the grasslands
agile creature known for stealing items
tiny creature with keen senses and high stealth
slender animal that hunts rodents and birds
weasel with keen hearing and smell
